Package com.millicast

Class Publisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.millicast.Client
      • com.millicast.Publisher
  • public class Publisher
extends Client
    The Publisher class. Its purpose is to publish media to a Millicast stream.

      The listener class used to receive publisher events

      • getCredentials

        public Publisher.Credential getCredentials()
        Get the current publisher credentials.
        Returns:
        The current credentials set in the publisher.

      • publish

        public void publish()
        Publish a stream to millicast You must be connected first in order to publish a stream. When you are publishing, the listener's method onPublishing will be called

      • unpublish

        public void unpublish()
        unpublish : stop sending media to millicast. The websocket connection will still be active. Call disconnect after if you want to close the websocket connection.

      • release

        public void release()
        Release any object involved with this instance. For example, object created in the native code which are not garbage collected Do not use this instance after calling release
